entry.title: HOMEMADE BAGELS 🥯 I love making a batch of bagels every other week and popping them in the freezer to have the best bagels on the hand whenever I want! 😋 RECIPE (8 bagels, 2h prep time): -1 1/4 cup (310ml) lukewarm water -2 Tsp instant yeast -1 Tbsp suga

entry.title: SINGLE SERVE LASAGNA 🍝 This recipe is super customizable… no eggplant? Leave it out! No lentils? Use tofu or chickpeas! Make it your own.🤭 RECIPE (1 servings, 55min prep time): Sauce: -1 small onion -1 clove garlic -1/2 eggplant Chop everything and sauté

entry.title: CHICKPEA SANDWICH 🥪 A great sandwich can make your day better!🤭 RECIPE (2 servings, 15min prep time): Chickpea smash: -1 can (220g) cooked chickpeas -1 small onion, chopped -1 bunch parsley, chopped -1 Tbsp tahini -juice of 1/2 lemon -1 Tbsp maple syrup
